issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement CONVERT_FROM(expression, ‘UTF8’, replacement char) function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12146](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12146). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement CONVERT_FROM(expression, ‘UTF8’, replacement char)

Converts the byte data in expression to UTF-8. Expression can be a literal string or a field name. Will replace any invalid UTF-8 characters with the replacement character.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12146?focusedCommentId=17319530) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9844
